appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message: Review papers using highlights and go!

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

HypothesisLoginRequired.message: You are not logged in hypothesis, please login in Hypothes.is or check internet connection.
HypothesisLoginRequired.description: Message to show when hypothesis login is required

GoogleSheetLoginRequired.message: You need to give permissions to access your Google Spreadsheet.
GoogleSheetLoginRequired.description: Message to show when Google Sheets permission is required

errorUpdatingAnnotationComment.message: Error updating annotation comment, please try it again.
errorUpdatingAnnotationComment.description: Message when fails updating annotation comment

GeneratingReviewReport.message: Generating review report, please be patient.

DeleteAllAnnotationsConfirmationTitle.message: Do you want to delete all the annotations?

DeleteAllAnnotationsConfirmationMessage.message: You are going to delete all the annotations from this review, are you sure that do you want to delete them? You cannot undo this action.

DeleteCriteriaConfirmationTitle.message: Do you want to delete this criteria?

DeleteCriteriaConfirmationMessage.message: You are going to delete this criteria. This will also delete all the annotations done in all the documents with this criteria. Are you sure that do you want to delete them? You cannot undo this action.

ContactAdministrator.message: If the error continues, please contact to Review&Go developers.

expectedInfoMessageNotFound.message: An information message must go here, but the developer has forgotten to add it...

CurrentSelectionEmpty.message: Nothing to highlight, current selection is empty

CurrentSelectionNotAnnotable.message: The selected content cannot be highlighted, is not part of the document

MoodleWrongAssignmentPage.message: There was a problem when retrieving task information from moodle. Make sure that you are in the main page of the assignment.

ErrorConfiguringHighlighter.message: There was a problem while creating the hypothes.is group. Please reload the page and try it again.

errorDeletingHypothesisAnnotation.message: Error deleting hypothesis annotation, please try it again
errorDeletingHypothesisAnnotation.description: Message when fails deleting annotation comment
